tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Phenomenal place to make you smile! This place deserves more then 5 stars. My, well, our story started almost 8 years ago, when we were trying to find a solution for my son’s sever underbite. Thanks to this place, my handsome young man does not shy from showing his beautiful smile. A couple of years ago, it was my turn to work on my teeth. Perfect result!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The office staff is so helpful, respectful, and responsive. And Dr. Srijan's patience with my girl is amazing. Dr. Srijan takes the time to answer all of her questions and likes to make sure she is feeling comfortable. I'm so happy we have found this practice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited Dr. Shilpi for getting braces to correct tooth gaps. She listened to me and explained me the options available. The treatment process was very smooth. The dental clinic is also unbelievably relaxing. There was no undue pressure to try out different kinds of treatment or procedures.  I highly recommend her to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been a smoker for a long time and that had taken a toll on the health of my tooth.  Plark, cavity and signs of decay were prominent.  She was not only gentle in her approach, but took utmost care in explaining me the issue.  She handled the cleaning really well and made sure that it was a pain-free experience for me.  I highly recommend the doctor.  She is a very accomplished young doctor.  Kudos!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: i had an amazing experience with Dr Shrijan shilpi, she was above my expectation , she examined me properly and understood my problem, before Dr srijan shilpi , i have visited various orthodontist in south delhi but unfortunately no one understand and they were not able  to understand , but luckily Dr shrijan shilpi  understood  my problem and started my treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I've been very happy and pleased with Dr. Srijan and the team at White willow orthodontics.  Dr. Srijan thoroughly explained all my options for treatment at my initial visit, but didn't pressure me to do one or another or even get treatment at all!  It was an elective, but I'm very happy I chose White willow Orthodontics.

Dr. Srijan makes sure all your questions are answered and that you're equipped to succeed in your treatment.  She's very knowledgeable and it shows! 

Her staff is friendly and welcoming.  No complaints!  Give white willow try.  You won't be disappointed.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Srijan's office is awesome. I was then given my consultation & Dr. Srijan walked me through the whole process & what to expect. I scheduled my appointment to put braces on for the following week & they were very accommodating to me & my schedule.

I had braces put on today & Dr. Srijan was super-efficient while putting them on.

I loved how she explained everything to me as she was putting the Braces on.

I'm highly impressed with their office, love the family-owned practice.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Srijan shilpi is a great orthodontist and most importantly a remarkable person. Her attention to detail is amazing making her a perfectionist at what she does. The staff is is very professional and supportive and you become attached to the family atmosphere that exists in his clinic

tags: None
review: The rate for this is fixed but after the procedure she demanded atleast 2x money and did not give receipt at the end of it. This unprofessional behaviour was very disappointing. One would expect better from people in this profession. Atleast some honesty.
reply_text: Dear sir we regret that you were not happy with your visit here. However I would like to inform you that the price for any treatment is subjective to patients tooth condition, it’s never fixed and we never promise you any such thing. Also we would have been dishonest if we would have told u a different pricing at start and charged you with something else but that didn’t happen. Lastly if u wanted an invoice you could have just asked we could have gladly given you. If u still need an invoice plz update your mail Id on the app or you can visit us in person. Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
